Summary: My wife & I were just coming home from work and noticed 3 redish orange orbs moving in slight formation
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife & I were just coming home from work and noticed 3 redish orange orbs moving in slight formation, while changing distances from each other & appeared to move quickly from a frontal possition to a distant possition.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Chilliwack
There was one other sighting in Chilliwack on or around May 2nd 2013
